sections.title: Purpose
sections.instructions: What purpose does the team (or role) serve in the organization?

sections.title: External Constraints
sections.instructions: What are important external constraints to the autonomy and influence of the delegatee(s)?

sections.title: Key responsibilities
sections.instructions: What are the delegatee’s main responsibilities, i.e. objectives, or essential work and decision making being delegated?

sections.title: Dependencies
sections.instructions: What are the essential dependencies between this domain and other parts of the organization?

sections.title: Key Challenges
sections.instructions: What are the three most important known (or anticipated) challenges the delegatee(s) might face?

sections.title: Key Deliverables
sections.instructions: What does the team/role provide to achieve its purpose and meet the key responsibilities and key challenges?

sections.title: Competencies, qualities and skills
sections.instructions: What competencies, qualities and skills are required – or at least preferable – to successfully achieve the purpose of this domain?

sections.title: Key Resources
sections.instructions: What are essential resources the delegatee(s) can make use of?

sections.title: Monitoring and Evaluation
sections.instructions: How will you monitor the key metrics, and when (and how) will you evaluate success of the team/role?

sections.title: Delegator Responsibilities
sections.instructions: What is the delegator’s contribution to the success of the delegatee(s)?

sections.title: Key Metrics
sections.instructions: What are the critical indicators of progress, project health or performance?
